features: All Natural - Handcrafted in the USA, this all-natural yoni oil for your intimate area is ideal for all ages and different skin types. It is carefully curated using infused herbal oils/sea moss in a registered facility by a Nurse and Pharmacist.

Pleasant Minty Floral Scent Lessens Odor & Dryness - Tired of having an embarrassing odor? Feel fresh every day with the natural blend of Mint Leaves, Rose, Jasmine and Lavender oils as well as Chamomile oil. It works like a charm and provides an all-day cooling feel to your private parts.

Fast All-in-One Relief - This yoni oil has no chemicals; it soothes, deters unusual discharge, rejuvenates, strengthens tissues, and aids with facial lines. Our feminine hygiene products also help as menstrual cycle support.

All-Round Intimate Care - Yoni oil maintains the natural pH balance for women. It helps calm intimate tissues and reduce itching, dryness, and discomfort. Handcrafted with natural feminine essential oils and extracts, it bestows smooth and hydrated skin with a fresh mint odor all day long.

Fresh Skin Every Day - Natural Quality Seamoss hygiene products for women are specially made to eliminate/balance odor-causing agents. This yoni oil for women helps decrease feminine dryness and irritation. Use as an ingrown hair oil to deter the growth of ingrown hair.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Yoni Oil Rose Oil Shower Gel and Yoni Oil Yoni Steam Usage Areas Intimate Regions Skin, Face, Body, Hair, Hands and Nails Intimate Regions. Whole Body. Avoid Use around Eyes Self-care: Intimate Regions and Facial Steam Directions 1-2 times daily, use after shower/bath Apply to face, body, hair, nails or skin once daily 1. Use in the shower, pump a generous amount onto your clean hand or a wet washcloth. 2. Cleanse intimate areas and skin with warm soapy water. 3. Rinse completely and dry with a soft towel. 2-3 Times a Week. Best to steam at least 3 days before or after menstrual cycle, never during. Remember to stay hydrated and remove any piercings that may come into contact with steam to avoid burns. Scent Mix of Lavender, Lemongrass, Mint, Rose, Rosemary, Chamomile Rose/Floral Yoni Shower Gel: Berries/Mint Yoni Oil: Mix of Lavender, Lemongrass, Mint, Rose, Rosemary, Chamomile Mix of Lavender, Lemongrass, Mint, Rose, Rosemary, Chamomile Eliminates Odor ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Maintain pH Levels ✓ ✓ ✓ Soothes and Rejuvinates Skin ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Eases Discomfort, irritation and itchiness ✓ ✓ ✓ Mosturize's Skin ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Vitamin E ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product absolutely amazing!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I suffer from bv,yeast unbalanced ph due to me working out 2hrs5 dsys a week and this girl cleared it all up in a few days leaving a nice natural smell. I love it! Tingles from the tea tree oil but a nice light tingle. Price to good to be true. I use to buy another product pink nookie trying to support small business owners but the price was ridiculous high not even including shipping when I found on here this product with exact same ingredients 3x less same size bottle free shipping because I'm a prime member. Can't beat that!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This should be a staple in your feminine care routine
reviews.reviewText: I love this product! It has absolutely become part of my feminine hygiene routine. Definitely helps with preventing ingrowns and razor burns after shaving. Keep skin smooth and hydrated. I Galway's use after using an organic wash in the shower and right before intimacy. This stuff smells so good and leave a light cooling tingling sensation ! I have definitely received compliments on smelling good while using this product !!

reviews.reviewText: It smells amazing, it’s not too heavy, it balances your PH &worka great after shaving for moisture lock

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Missing my rose petals in my bottle. Soothes very well
reviews.reviewText: The oil moisturized, soothed, and relieved me. The scent is not a favorite but I can tolerate it due to the ingredients being resourceful. Taste? Meh could’ve been better same goes for the scent. I was sad when I realized mine came delivered with no rose petals inside. Other than the things I dislike about this oil. It absolutely did what I needed it to do as far as, moisturizing my skin & vulva, soothing any soreness, eliminating any odor, and giving a cooling sensation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This smells great. I took the label off the front though because it’s a bit risqué to have just sitting in my bathroom. lol mentions some sexual things. It peels off super easy and the petals in the oil are so pretty I prefer having it off.The smell is strong with the lemon scent but doesn’t smell too citrus forward, it’s a nice light clean smell.As for the effects it claims to have, I haven’t experienced any of them but I will say it does help a lot with razor burn and just general aftershave issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must try especially Lemongrass if you like the citrus, it's strong smell
reviews.reviewText: Loved it, it last all day especially the Lemongrass one. That was my first choice, I finished it and I decided to try the Peach, just because my hubby dosent like the smell of Lemongrass. However I loved it! It's a strong smell at first he ask if I had Vicks on . The peachy on smell just like it, however it dosent last long, also it mix in your ur musk and it just smells weird can't describe it. With Lemongrass scent it dosent matter how many hrs went by it sell like that. Peach is more for intimacy time!!
